channel.title: bike on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in bike on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Bike Route
item.description: Just uploaded few pictures from my bike route as promised in earlier post. There is a movie which I tried to shoot while riding with my digital camera (which is quite old now). Last weekend was very rainy and stormy so being at home tried MPG4 and QuickTime. MOV version is around 7 MB but the quality is so so while QuickTime version of the same is big around 26MB with better quality.
